casebody.data:
PARODI v. TILFORD. (Supreme Court, Appellate Division, Second Department. March 4, 1910.) Appeal from Municipal Court, Borough of Brooklyn, Second District. Action By Stanislaus J. Parodi against George Tilford. From a judgment for defendant, plaintiff appeals. Reversed, and new trial ordered.

Argued before HIRSCHBERG, P. J., and WOODWARD, THOMAS, RICH, and CARR, JJ.

Henry W. Goddard, for appellant Edward J. Walsh, for respondent. PER CURIAM.

Judgment of the Municipal Court reversed, and new trial ordered, costs to abide the event, on the authority of Melanie Parodi v. Til-ford (decided herewith) 121 N. Y. Supp. 535.
